original_title: 官能テクニック　唇・舌・指
overview: Triple play of passion! Three bodies entwined in a dizzying rapture!  In the bedroom, Tomoko, Hiroshi, and Yukie's naked bodies intertwine, writhing in agony and rapture, and Tomoko's voice echoes, "Who shall we visit tomorrow?"
title: Kannou Tekunikku Kuchibiru Shita Yubi
